author: {'steamid': '76561198160468686', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 237, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1656796363}
review: C'est un bon jeu, mais avec des graphismes en faible résolution, pas de réel plein écran, des enchaînements de menus pas toujours très clairs, une histoire hyper basique. Mais par contre, gros point fort, on peut choisir entre les modes SWAP / GROUP / CHAIN et cela permet vraiment de jouer de la manière qu'on préfère. Autre truc cool, il y a des badges Steam. Bref, moyen, mais allez, pouce bleu d'encouragement.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978350645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 1188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1180, 'last_played': 1633538738}
review: This is a decent match-3 game with plenty of content -- 147 levels if you take the time to 3-star everything and unlock all of the bonus levels. There is nothing groundbreaking here, but it does everything a traditional match-3 game is supposed to do, and it does it quite well. I think anyone who has enjoyed games like Spooky Bonus, Button Tales, or Heroes of Hellas would probably like this one, too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074169975', 'num_games_owned': 820, 'num_reviews': 694, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 373, 'last_played': 1549569919}
review: To unlock levels and complete the game, you need to win up to 3 stars in each level. But those stars are won by gathering points in it, not by completing the level. So if you want 3 stars, you have to pay attention not to complete the level until you have 3 stars. If you don't pay attention to it and complete the level normaly, you will have 1 or 2 stars and won't be able to unlock all the levels. It's stupid. And the game is low res, without any true fullscreen. Play another match-3. There are so much better on steam...
